member.name: ITfMouseTrackerACP.AdviseMouseSink
member.summary: Called to install a mouse event sink.
member.param: Pointer to an interface that specifies the range of text that the mouse sink is installed for.
Pointer to the interface. The application must increment this object reference count and save the interface.
Pointer to a DWORD that receives a cookie that identifies the mouse event sink.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: One or more parameters are invalid.
The application does not support mouse event sinks.

member.name: ITfMouseTrackerACP.UnadviseMouseSink
member.summary: Called to remove a mouse event sink.
member.param: Specifies the mouse advise sink identifier. This value is obtained by a call to .

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The application does not support mouse event sinks.

member.name: ITfMouseTrackerACP
member.summary: The ITfMouseTrackerACP interface is implemented by an application to support mouse event sinks. This interface is used by the TSF manager to add and remove mouse event sinks in an ACP-based application. The TSF manager obtains this interface by calling the application's ITextStoreACP.QueryInterface with IID_ITfMouseTrackerACP.
